segments.text: I look out the window; the garden is so calm and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a stark contrast to the turmoil inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is blissfully unaware of the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems content, focused only on her chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't shake the feeling that something is about to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching, his hand almost in the cookie jar now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they would just stop and consider the mess they’re creating.
segments.speaker: PAR
